title: cmd/gc, cmd/ld: importing a package named 'weak' causes panic
body:
by **skunix**: 
Seems that simply importing a package named weak causes a panic in main.init()

building the 'panics' program in the attached 

What is the expected output?
nothing

What do you see instead?
panic at line 0 in main.init
using 6g compiler (works in gccgo)

On Ubuntu 12.10

Same result against go 1.0.2 and

go version devel +eb854c88d4a6 Thu Oct 18 15:39:04 2012 +0900
Attachments: 1. test_weak.tar.gz (801 bytes)
